ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to make you mad or anything but this sounds a lot like jealousy. It seems your only feel twinking is cheating when some high level s secondary char is
ygData.messageBody:
Not to make you mad or anything but this sounds a lot like jealousy. It
seems your only feel twinking is cheating when some high level's secondary
char is twinked with stuff you don't have. That's just what it sounds like
to me anyway.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: shinara@... <shinara@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, October 04, 1999 9:18 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Twinking


>From: shinara@...
>
>I have played several characters till early teens, I must say my new bard
(10th) is the best of the lot. I trully enjoy the reward every level, I also
like the fact not all songs are avail at every Bard Hall. I have opinions on
Twinking but they are simply my opinion and even though I feel justified in
my beliefs I understand other people also have their own beliefs. I can
easily see how wars based on relegion happen, but as long as we all respect
everyones right to an opinion then things will be fine.
>I was given 20Plat as a new player by a person simply walking by, I had
never met him before and was reciently given a Thulian Claw by an old friend
(Yes this is twinking) but I do not feel like I have cheated in any way, I
did not ask for the claw and I have copped plenty for using it. Usually like
I am 16th level and you con green to me yet you have a high level weapon you
cheating twink, I feel this not fair as all I have is this claw and a set of
PW armour and a drum.
>
>Anyway my 2c on twinking.
>
>Shinara
>11th Season Singer
>Tarew Marr
>

>>
